text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Uwaba ari umwanzi wa Malayika Jibril (kubera ko ari we wakuzaniye ubutumwa), mu by’ukuri (amenye ko Jibril) yayimanuye (Qur’an) akayishyira mu mutima wawe ku burenganzira bwa Allah, kugira ngo ishimangire ibyayibanjirije (ibitabo), ibe umuyoboro n’inkuru nziza ku bemera.”
